name: Star Flyte
description:
Star Flyte was built as an Arcade game to be played on Lythbound. Your score will fail to send when playing the game here. Please play at Lythbound.com for your score to count in our high score table!

Additionally, games on Lythbound will receive updates before games on Itch. Please be aware this may not be the most recent version!

✦ Control the Flyte by using your keyboard arrow keys, keyboard AWSD keys, or swiping in the direction you want to turn.

✦ Collect the colored stars to earn points, but avoid the square black holes!

✦ Running into a black hole or the empty stars behind you will result in a game over.
(You can safely travel through the walls to wrap around the screen.)

✦ Pause the game by clicking or tapping the || icon in the top right or by pressing the 'P' key on your keyboard.

[ ]enters fullscreen mode (recommended for mobile). ][ leaves fullscreen mode.
